roleset.name: downward motion

roles.note: Arg0 not observed with nominalizations, so omitted. If you see one, call it arg0 and send it in.

example.name: args 1 and 3
example.text: Mr. Snyder hits close to home for anyone who as ever lost a job as he describes his sink into depression
